title: Throwdown League of Legends Community Night 17th August
body:
Hey Gang!

I wanted to let you know that Throwdown have launched their Community Night, and it’s coming up tomorrow!
Fight for a share in a $150 prize pool with your friends!

If you want to get involved with the rest of community, all you have to do is click right here >> http://bit.ly/TDCNBTLFY

You can get your mates together and create a team, or sign up as a Free Agent and meet new players!
Registrations will close tomorrow before 6PM, so get in quick.

I look forward to seeing you all on the rift and can’t wait for Thursday night!

Cheers,
Hysterics
